definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
identity card/also written 身份證|身份证[shen1 fen4 zheng4]
variant of 身份證號碼|身份证号码[shen1 fen4 zheng4 hao4 ma3]/I.D. number

sentences.english: Could I see your ID and the notice left by the postman?
sentences.chinese: 請借我看身分證和郵差留下的通知。

sentences.english: The clerk refused to sell her alcohol because she didn't have her ID card.
sentences.chinese: 店員拒絕賣酒給她，只因爲她沒帶她的身分證。

sentences.english: 'Bain't you glad that we've become gentlefolk?'
sentences.chinese: 我們已經成了有身分的人了，你高興嗎？

sentences.english: Formal invitations are usually issued and accepted in the third person.
sentences.chinese: 正式邀請書通常以第三人稱的身分發出和接受。

sentences.english: People often build their identity around their defects.
sentences.chinese: 人往往將自我的身分建立在他們的短處上。

sentences.english: I attach a copy of my Hong Kong Identity Card.
sentences.chinese: 現付上本人香港身分證副本一份。

sentences.english: I have not applied to other universities under the status of overseas Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本人在華並未以僑生身分申請其他大學校院。

sentences.english: Sometimes you pay fewer taxes if you're self-employed.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是自營商的身分有時候可以少付些稅金。
他的衣服掩飾了他的身分。

sentences.english: Passport number should be given only if you do not possess HKID card.
sentences.chinese: 有香港身分證的下填寫護照號碼。

sentences.english: He found it very demeaning to have to work for former employee.
sentences.chinese: 他覺得要爲他以前的僱圓工作很失身分。

sentences.english: Q11. Can a foreign issuer apply as a technology-based enterprise for a primary OTC listing?
sentences.chinese: 外國發行人可否以科技事業身分申請股票第一上櫃？

sentences.english: Destabilizing factors and uncertainties are clearly on the rise in our region.
sentences.chinese: 不不變身分以及不確定性在我們這一地域正較着上升。

sentences.english: The distinction of identity and the ascription of liability is the basis of all legal relationship.
sentences.chinese: 身分辨識及責任歸屬是一切法律關係的基礎。

sentences.english: Sir, could you show me your ID card?
sentences.chinese: 先生，可以讓我看一下你的身分證嗎？

sentences.english: Police inventoried the diamonds and confirmed Austein's identity.
sentences.chinese: 警方將鑽石開列清單登錄，並確認奧斯坦的身分。

eyes and ears/sb's attention or notice/information/knowledge/spies

to extort a confession/Taiwan pr. [po4 gong1]
identity card/also written 身份證|身份证[shen1 fen4 zheng4]
